channel.title: Rupert|Minidoka County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Rupert|Minidoka County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction (Exit 211). Use US-30 west for Heyburn and Burley; I-84/US-30 East for Pocatello and Ogden (Utah); I-84 West for Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: ID-24 East/ID-25 West at ID-24/ID-25 Split
item.description: ID-24 East/ID-25 West at ID-24/ID-25 Split in Rupert. Turn right to continue west on ID-25; continue straight for ID-24 to I-84.

item.title: ID-24 East/ID-25 West Split in Rupert
item.description: ID-24 East/ID-25 West split in Rupert. Turn right for ID-25 to Paul; continue straight on ID-24 for Heyburn and Burley.

item.title: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84
item.description: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84 in Rupert

item.title: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84
item.description: ID-24/ID-25 East to I-84 in Rupert

item.title: ID-24 East at ID-25 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 East at ID-25 in Rupert. Turn left for ID-25 east to Pocatello; right for ID-24 East /ID-25 West to Burley and Heyburn. Use either direction for I-84. ID-25 joins ID-24 east through Rupert.

item.title: ID-24 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 (Meridian Road) at Baseline Road in Rupert. Turn left on Baseline Road to continue east on ID-24 for Heyburn and Burley.

item.title: ID-24 - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 (Baseline Road) at Meridian Road in Rupert. Turn right on Meridian Road to continue on ID-24 to Minidoka NWR.

item.title: N Meridian Road at ID-24
item.description: N Meridian Road at ID-24 west to Lake Walcott State Park

item.title: ID-24 East - Rupert
item.description: ID-24 east (Read Ave. at N Meridian) in Rupert.

item.title: ID-24 East - Rupert
item.description: Entering Rupert on ID-24 south. Speed Limit 35 MPH. Rupert is the county seat of Minidoka County.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
item.description: I-84 west on Exit 211 offramp. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; turn left for BL-84 West/US-30 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 211, US-30/ID-24 to Heyburn and Burley

item.title: I-84 West Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24
ID-24 West at I-84 and US-30
item.description: I-84 west onramp at the eastern terminus of ID-24

item.title: ID-24 West at I-84/US-30 Jct.
item.description: End of ID-24 west at I-84/US-30 junction

item.title: ID-25 West at ID-24
item.description: ID-25 west at ID-24. Use ID-24 west for Minidoka. Merge left for ID-24/ID-25 west to Heyburn and I-84. ID-24 and ID-25 join through Rupert.
